How can AlphaFold-Multimer's predictions: By modeling potential interactions between nanobodies and the spike protein to identify promising candidates.
By predicting the genetic sequence of the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein.
By simulating the immune response to SARS-CoV-2 infection.
By designing vaccines targeting the SARS-CoV-2 nucleocapsid protein.
What is a general role of AlphaFold-Mult: Understanding complex protein interactions essential for drug discovery and development.
Predicting the metabolic pathways in liver diseases.
Analyzing the genetic mutations in viral genomes.
Designing small molecules for cancer therapy.
What is the primary focus of the interac: The interaction between MRGPRX4 and receptor activity-modifying proteins (RAMPs), particularly RAMP2.
The interaction between MRGPRX4 and the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein.
The interaction between MRGPRX4 and cholestatic itch receptors.
The interaction between MRGPRX4 and liver disease biomarkers.
What structural feature does the AlphaFo: A disulfide bond between TM4 and TM5.
A hydrogen bond network between TM1 and TM2.
A salt bridge between the extracellular loops.
A covalent bond between the intracellular domains.
